title: Federico Bahamontes, Spain’s first Tour de France winner, dies at 95
content:
The 'Eagle of Toledo' won six King of the Mountains jerseys and one yellow jersey as he raced during cycling's 'golden era' of the 1950s and 1960s.

Read the full article at Federico Bahamontes, Spain’s first Tour de France winner, dies at 95 on Velo.
author: ahood
